::Slaughter::

       Slaughter continued on and entered the Dark Avian wit=
h ease.  Without a signature, or anything robotic for that matter, he had s=
ome advantages.  Slaughter walked around the base, leaving a trail of slime=
 wherever he went.  Then, he peeked into a room, and saw Squawktalk and Cep=
ta.  He licked his lips with his big, slimy tongue, saliva and slime drippi=
ng from his mouth to the ground with hunger.

       Slaughter couldn't hol=
d back.  He ran into the room, and tried to grab Squawktalk's wing with his=
 pincir.
